name: SanskritToolkit

screenshots.caption: Search Meaning of Sanskrit text by Right Mouse Click on Text
User inputs to perform sanskrit word search and transliteration
For User Input Click the Icon on the bottom right corner of mozilla browser

short_description:
This is a Firefox add-on which can be installed in any versions of Mozilla Firefox.
It provides functions for searching of sanskrit text meanings directly from the browser page.
Like if the html page contains sanskrit text the user can just select the text and press right click on the text then it will show one contextual menu item as "Search Meaning of This Text" as you can see it in the Screenshot image also.After the user clicks the menu item it will search the meaning of the sanskrit text in sanskrit dictionary.
It has one feature like transliteration from English to Devanagari(Hindi) .When the add-on will be installed an image icon will be shown at the right bottom corner of the browser window.When you click the icon a new page will be opened where you can see two options are present like "Search Meaning of Sanskrit text" and "Transliteration". The user can choose any options and perform the task.
summary: Firefox add-on for Sanskrit processing (Linux OS and Windows OS)
